mapper.sql: id, softwareName, APKName, supportROM, interfaceLanguage, softwareSize, updateDate, devId, appInfo, status, onSaleDate, offSaleDate, flatformId, categoryLevel3, downloads, createdBy, creationDate, modifyBy, modifyDate, categoryLevel1, categoryLevel2, logoPicPath, logoLocPath, versionId
mapper.select: SELECT id FROM app_info WHERE APKName = #{APKName}

select
distinct
'true' as QUERYID,
from app_info
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert: insert into app_info (id, softwareName, APKName, supportROM, interfaceLanguage, softwareSize, updateDate, devId, appInfo, status, onSaleDate, offSaleDate, flatformId, categoryLevel3, downloads, createdBy, creationDate, modifyBy, modifyDate, categoryLevel1, categoryLevel2, logoPicPath, logoLocPath, versionId ) values (#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{softwarename,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{apkname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{supportrom,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{interfacelanguage,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{softwaresize,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{updatedate,jdbcType=DATE}, #{devid,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{appinfo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{onsaledate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{offsaledate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{flatformid,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{categorylevel3,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{downloads,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{createdby,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{creationdate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{modifyby,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{modifydate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{categorylevel1,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{categorylevel2,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{logopicpath,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{logolocpath,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{versionid,jdbcType=BIGINT} )

update app_info
id = #{record.id,jdbcType=BIGINT},
softwareName = #{record.softwarename,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
APKName = #{record.apkname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
